metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17044 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.9.x allowing HVM guest OS users to cause a denial of service (infinite loop and host OS hang) by leveraging the mishandling of Populate on Demand (PoD) errors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17044` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxen-4.9 - 4.9.2-0ubuntu1
libxenstore3.0 - 4.9.2-0ubuntu1
xen-hypervisor-4.6-amd64 - 4.9.2-0ubuntu1
xen-hypervisor-4.6-arm64 - 4.9.2-0ubuntu1
xen-hypervisor-4.6-armhf - 4.9.2-0ubuntu1
xen-hypervisor-4.7-amd64 - 4.9.2-0ubuntu1
xen-hypervisor-4.7-arm64 - 4.9.2-0ubuntu1
xen-hypervisor-4.7-armhf - 4.9.2-0ubuntu1
xen-hypervisor-4.8-amd64 - 4.9.2-0ubuntu1
xen-hypervisor-4.8-arm64 - 4.9.2-0ubuntu1
xen-hypervisor-4.8-armhf - 4.9.2-0ubuntu1
